QuestData.Title: Phaestus, Genesis of Aeons
QuestData.Description:
Sika reports the Forsworn are widespread. They not only took over production, but the rise as well!
They organize their armies from the cliffs, send word back to their leaders.
They've ransacked our shrine to the First Forgelite and took her hammer. My hammer!
Defeat their commander, retrieve Phaestus. You must go now!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Overseer Atticus harnessed the power of Phaestus to create a centurion army of his own.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect Phaestus, Genesis of Aeons from Overseer Atticus.
